title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name, but this is not found when searching for declarations. It should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, display the element name and not the fully qualified name. Searching via the context menu in the packages view works.
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. This is not found when searching for declarations.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the Search dialog should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Packages view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click on the package and choose the 'Search' option.
4. In the Search dialog, enter a declaration name.
5. Click on the 'Search' button.
6. Verify that no results are returned.

Note: Repeat the above steps using the context menu in the packages view to confirm that searching via the context menu works.
